cast.name: 凯蒂·麦克格雷斯 Katie McGrath
特拉维斯·特纳 Travis Turner
莱拉·德·梅扎 Leilah de Meza
米尔斯·理查森 Miles Richardson
夏洛蒂·索尔特 Charlotte Salt

writer.name: 迈克尔·达米安 Michael Damian

director.name: 迈克尔·达米安 Michael Damian

introduction: Jules Daly（Katie McGrath，《梅林传奇》）最近快忙晕了。自从姐姐和姐夫遭遇可怕的意外不幸丧生后，她便成了外甥Milo（Travis Turner）和外甥女Maddie（Leilah De Meza）的监护人。她整晚都要照顾这两个调皮的家伙，白天根本无心工作，以至于被老板解雇；她的车子老是出毛病；Milo和Maddie的恶作剧已经吓怕了至少一打保姆……天底下还有多少倒霉事在等着她呢？穿着考究的英国男管家Paisley Winterbottom（Miles Richardson）的到来或许会改变Jules的命运。他自称是孩子的祖父Edward公爵（Roger Moore，原007的扮演者）派来的，邀请一家人前往英国共度圣诞。Edward公爵一辈子没有和儿子打过交道，但是儿子死后他突然想看看自己的孙儿孙女。Jules一开始想拒绝，但最终还是去了。那种奢华到极致的生活让Jules发晕！她变得笨拙、尴尬、笑话频出，但她也逐渐将自己的影响力带进了这个家庭。At the invitation of an estranged relative, a young woman travels with her niece and nephew to a castle in Europe for Christmas where she unwittingly falls for a dashing Prince.An enchanting tale that will touch your heart and leave you full of the festive spirit! It's Christmas time and when Jules (Katie McGrath, BBC Series Merlin) receives an unexpected invitation from a distant relative she travels to Europe with her niece and nephew to a fairytale castle. As they try to instill, in their stuffy, British family, the true magic of Christmas, Jules discovers that sometimes what you're searching for can be found in the most unexpected of places... Featuring an all-star cast (including Roger Moore), this heart-warming and magical motion picture can be enjoyed by the whole family over and over again.
